docs.snippet: Under its plan for the promotion of closer educational and cultural relations between the Americas, Pan American Airways System announced yesterday that fifteen outstanding students from as many Latin-American countries had been selected to receive...
docs.lead_paragraph: Under its plan for the promotion of closer educational and cultural relations between the Americas, Pan American Airways System announced yesterday that fifteen outstanding students from as many Latin-American countries had been selected to receive travel fellowships to enable them to study in schools and colleges of the United States during the academic year of 1942-43.

docs.snippet: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Sept. 12 -- At the end of her third week at war Brazil can put in the credit column tighter anti-blockade measures with the aid of United Nations forces, restricting submarine activities; greater quantities of war materials...
docs.lead_paragraph: RIO DE JANEIRO, Brazil, Sept. 12 -- At the end of her third week at war Brazil can put in the credit column tighter anti-blockade measures with the aid of United Nations forces, restricting submarine activities; greater quantities of war materials leaving Brazil and reaching their destinations safely and more Allied ships arriving in Brazil to load ore and other war materials.

docs.snippet: THE protean complexion of Axis broadcasting is perhaps best demonstrated in the termite beam "Mexican." This rattlesnake of the air is a good example of just what Americans are fighting. Under the guise of a neutral, broadcasts containing poisonous...
docs.lead_paragraph: THE protean complexion of Axis broadcasting is perhaps best demonstrated in the termite beam "Mexican." This rattlesnake of the air is a good example of just what Americans are fighting. Under the guise of a neutral, broadcasts containing poisonous Nazi catch phrases are sent out as coming from the Western Hemisphere.
